channel.title: Posts on MUONIC STUDIO
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on MUONIC STUDIO

item.title: My 7 Magic Writing
item.description: The text below is a work created by Kevin on Oct 17th, 2018 under the 7 Magic requested by my dear English teacher, Lu. The 7 Magic is a request that gives 7 words to use in a writing, this time they are: absorb, contribute, cure, blame, attend, conclusion, expose The text is inspired from the TV series Rick andMorty created by Justin Roiland and Dan Harmon. My dear Morty,

item.title: New Collection Album "Soul & Life" Global Released
item.description: This album collected Kvar_ispw17’s finest tracks from 2014 to 2017, released under artist name “Kvar Ispw17” (aka. Ki17). “Soul & Life” has 6 tracks added up to 23 minutes and 51 seconds. Tracks’ Information Moon This track was first appeared in my “Digital Monster: Tamer” album in 2015. The song is intended to describe an encounter with a grand moon pouring the moonlight in the room and clear the mood of the whole environment.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is a test for generating post pages by hugo. By the way, Hello World!.
